articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Thursday's Mini-Report, 1.30.20
articles.content:
Today’s edition of quick hits:
* Coronavirus: The World Health Organization on Thursday declared the new coronavirus outbreak a global public health emergency. While nearly 99 percent of the 7,874 diagnoses have been limited to China, 98 cases have been diag… [+2344 chars]

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Trump cabinet secretary looks for silver lining in coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: When a sentence begins, "I don't want to talk about a victory lap over a very malignant disease, but..." that sentence will not and cannot end well.
articles.content: By and large, Donald Trump and his team have responded to the coronavirus in a tempered way. Yesterday, for example, the president published a tweet, featuring photographs from the White House Situation Room, with a message about the health threat that was in… [+1992 chars]
